text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Oh gosh…… Baku, can I talk 
to you for a minute?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Yes! What is it? Although I have to head 
to the faculty room soon!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
All the more reason then! 
Try taking the deep V breath! 
Ready, go ——

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Nn!? I don't really understand, but sure!! ～～……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
V————!! 
……～～ What'd you think of that!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Good, you're back. 
You were getting a little too fixated!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Remember what our club teacher always 
used to say? "When you feel like you're 
about to fail, take a deep V breath!"

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ohh! Now that you mention it, yeah! 
I feel like I can think clearly again～～!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Now I can calmly write a letter of
apology for breaking the door as well!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Oh gosh…… I was a little late, huh……
